location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Stephen Babington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is explaining, as per the commands of the Bombay Government dated 22 May 1811, that the Persian receipts for guns and arms were not translated into English as they were themselves translated from the English list provided by Lieutenant Livingston.
